Test Name: Gum Arabic, IgE, and Serum Protein Analysis
Specimen Type: Serum (for IgE and serum proteins) and Gum Arabic solution
Purpose: To generate accurate and precise quantitative results for Gum Arabic concentration, IgE levels, and serum protein measurements by standardizing sample preparation, analysis, and documentation procedures.
Equipment: Centrifuge; ELISA reader; pH meter; Spectrophotometer; Analytical balance; Micropipettes
